StoredProcedureOraclev10g.name: UPDATESTAFF
StoredProcedureOraclev10g.source: CREATE OR REPLACE PROCEDURE GRUPO10.UPDATESTAFF(pIDPerson IN NUMBER, pFirstName IN VARCHAR2, pSurname IN VARCHAR2,&lt;br/&gt;pTitle IN VARCHAR2, pAddress IN VARCHAR2, pPhone IN NUMBER, pPostcode IN NUMBER,&lt;br/&gt;pCampusLocation IN VARCHAR2, pIdBuilding IN VARCHAR2, pNumberOffice IN VARCHAR2, pStaffType IN VARCHAR2) AS&lt;br/&gt;BEGIN &lt;br/&gt; UPDATE Staff_table staf&lt;br/&gt; SET staf.surname = pSurname,&lt;br/&gt; staf.firstName = pFirstName,&lt;br/&gt; staf.title = pTitle,&lt;br/&gt; staf.address = pAddress,&lt;br/&gt; staf.phone = pPhone,&lt;br/&gt; staf.postcode = pPostcode,&lt;br/&gt; staf.campusLocation = pCampusLocation,&lt;br/&gt; staf.idBuilding = pIdBuilding,&lt;br/&gt; staf.numberOffice = pNumberOffice,&lt;br/&gt; staf.staffType = pStaffType&lt;br/&gt; WHERE staf.idPerson = pIDPerson;&lt;br/&gt;END updateStaff;
